guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for dextromethorphan / quinidine and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

text.html: "The quinidine component of NUEDEXTA [dextromethorphan / quinidine] is not expected to contribute to the effectiveness of NUEDEXTA [dextromethorphan / quinidine] in PMs, but adverse events of the quinidine are still possible. In those patients who may be at risk of significant toxicity due to quinidine, genotyping to determine if they are PMs should be considered prior to making the decision to treat with NUEDEXTA [dextromethorphan / quinidine]." See label for more information.

citations.title: Drugs@FDA: Drug Product NUEDEXTA (dextromethorphan hydrobromide and quinidine sulfate), NDA021879, Avanir Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
